title: The Quilting Guardian: The Adventures of Yvonne Edwards
summary: Over the course of a week, Yvonne Edwards, a 58-year-old quilting enthusiast, discovers her latent superpowers of premonition and healing through her quilting hobby to save her community from a sinister threat.
summaryGerman: Im Laufe einer Woche entdeckt Yvonne Edwards, eine 58-jährige Quilting-Enthusiastin, ihre verborgenen Superkräfte der Vorahnung und Heilung durch ihr Quilting-Hobby, um ihre Gemeinde vor einer finsteren Bedrohung zu retten.
summaryDutch: In de loop van een week ontdekt Yvonne Edwards, een 58-jarige quilting enthousiast, haar latente superkrachten van voorspelling en genezing door haar hobby om haar gemeenschap te redden van een sinistere dreiging.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Yvonne Edwards, une passionnée de quilting de 58 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs latents de prémonition et de guérison grâce à son passe-temps pour sauver sa communauté d'une menace sinistre.

story.text: Yvonne Edwards stumbles upon a mysterious piece of fabric with glowing threads while sorting through material at her local fabric store.
Working on her new quilt, Yvonne experiences a sudden vision of an accident at the town square.
Yvonne rushes to the square to find the crowd panicked; she calms them with her sudden ability to heal a small child using her quilt.
News spreads of her miraculous deeds; Yvonne is approached by community leaders requesting her help with planning disaster-prevention strategies.
While planning, Yvonne receives more visions that guide the community to avoid future disasters.
The town holds a celebration in Yvonne's honor; she feels content but senses her abilities grow stronger as she continues quilting.
Yvonne decides to set up a workshop, teaching others to quilt while secretly passing on the knowledge of how to harness their hidden powers for good.

ending: Thus began the legendary tale of Yvonne Edwards, who quilted not just with threads, but with strands of fate and hope.
moral: Every skill, no matter how ordinary it seems, has the potential to bring extraordinary good.
